column4: Hello guys only one question please is there any possibility to start virtualbox or vmware automatically as a service or whatever to run a specific guest OS and start with the operating system
I am using both linux and windows

i have no idea about vmware -- for VBox you might want to have a look at VBoxTool which claims to be able to do it http://vboxtool.sourceforge.net/ -- side note, this is the one feature I feel is SO missing from VBox
